import React,{useState} from 'react' import data from './data.json' import './OCMain.css' export default function OCMain(){ const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("winner"); console.log(data) return(
  • setActiveTab("winner")}>Recent Winners
  • setActiveTab("newGiveaways")}>New Giveaways
  • setActiveTab("endingGiveaways")}>Ending Giveaways
{data.filter(item => item === activeTab).map((tabbedContent) => {return(
